nodes.text: The Lumini Pirates were a pirate group led by a smuggler named  Kaerobani.

A significant conflict between the pirates and the New Republic occurred in 10 ABY when the pirates, using an Interdictor cruiser, pulled a Republic CR90 corvette out of hyperspace and stole the Holocron it was transporting. The pirates however didn't count on Mara Jade, who was stationed onboard. After arriving at the pirates' orbital shipyard via a crate, she stowed away on a ship to Kaerobani's base on Rathalay. There, due largely to the raiders' sloppiness, Jade was able to recover the Holocron and escape.
